title: Overview
content:
# What changed?

Update existing installations using `Update > Omarchy` from Omarchy menu (`Super + Alt + Space`). 

Install on new machines with the ISO:
- Download: https://iso.omarchy.org/omarchy-3.3.2.iso
- SHA256: 64dcb48029cca7668170e7d2a9b6b95058d522d6fe8b3588f14a35e687ba903d

title: Fixes
content: * Fix Nvidia driver installation issue causing silent error failing mkinicpio build by @ryanrhughes + @PhaedrusFlow

title: Additions
content:
* Add omarchy-update.log to the update process for debugging and error checking by @ryanrhughes 

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/basecamp/omarchy/compare/v3.3.1...v3.3.2
